SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler

Interface MessageEndState

All Known Implementing Classes:
SMTPConnection
public interface MessageEndState
Operations for finalizing message acceptance.

This interface is provided to MessageDataHandler.messageComplete(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler.MessageEndState) and allows the handler to accept or reject the completed message.

After accepting or rejecting, the connection returns to the mail-from ready state where another transaction can begin.

Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
  • MessageDataHandler.messageComplete(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler.MessageEndState)
  • MailFromHandler

  • Method Details

    • acceptMessageDelivery

      void acceptMessageDelivery(String queueId, MailFromHandler handler)
      Message accepted for delivery (250 response).
      Parameters:
      queueId - optional queue identifier for tracking (may be null)
      handler - receives next transaction

    • rejectMessageTemporary

      void rejectMessageTemporary(String message, MailFromHandler handler)
      Temporarily rejects message (450 response).

      Used when the message cannot be accepted right now but might be acceptable later (e.g., downstream server unavailable).

      Parameters:
      message - the rejection message
      handler - receives next transaction

    • rejectMessagePermanent

      void rejectMessagePermanent(String message, MailFromHandler handler)
      Permanently rejects message (550 response).

      Used when the message cannot be delivered (e.g., content filtering rejection, authentication failure).

      Parameters:
      message - the rejection message
      handler - receives next transaction

    • rejectMessagePolicy

      void rejectMessagePolicy(String message, MailFromHandler handler)
      Rejects for policy violation (553 response).

      Used for policy-based rejections (e.g., DMARC reject policy).

      Parameters:
      message - the rejection message
      handler - receives next transaction

    • serverShuttingDown

      void serverShuttingDown()
      Server is shutting down, close gracefully.

      Sends a 421 response indicating the server is shutting down and closes the connection.
